sentences.sContent: Mobile phones have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.sCn: 移动电话已经成为我们生活中的必需品。

sentences.sContent: ...as indispensable delicious food of the Festival...
...On Maintaining TrustTrust is crucial and indispensable in maintaining a relationship...
...the whole society should emphasize the importance of Chinese language in order to make it clear that it is one indispensable part of Chinese culture and Chinese race...
...we can raise students’ awareness that the study of Chinese is indispensable to us...

synos.tran: 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的

remMethod.val: in(不) ＋ dispensable(可有可无的) → 不是可有可无的 → 必不可少的

words.tran: 不可缺少；必要；责无旁贷
